title: Scientific and Technical Services
mainDescription: The Institute of Ferrous Metallurgy provides scientific and technical services in the field of metallurgical production, developing recommendations, approvals, expert opinions, design, scientific and technical documents, regulations, and standards in the following areas:
services: External treatment of pig iron and steel
Production of long and flat rolled products
Thermomechanical processing of metals and alloys
clientsDescription: IFM employees provide scientific services to industrial enterprises of the Ukrainian and global mining and metals complex, educational institutions, government authorities, and other organizations.
scientificServicesTitle: IFM provides scientific services in the form of:
scientificServices: Expert opinions on the possibility of applying new technical solutions, technologies, etc.
Technical support for important technological operations, for example, shutdown and commissioning of blast furnaces and other equipment to design capacity
Development of recommendations and technical solutions for the implementation of new technologies for manufacturing metal products
Conducting research on the properties and quality of new types of raw materials and fuel
Development of automatic equipment control systems, expert systems, and decision support systems
Development of projects for technical re-equipment of enterprises or individual sections of the production process
Participation in the work of commissions and committees dealing with the development of Ukraine's mining and metals complex
numberedServices: Decarbonization and gradual transition to low-carbon technologies in blast furnace production
Development of energy-efficient technology for steel smelting in oxygen converters with an increased share of scrap metal, involving a two-stage process
Development of new and improvement of existing technologies for the production of metal rolled products for urgent needs and post-war recovery of Ukraine

Improving the service properties of heavy plate used for manufacturing critical metal products, including for the defense industry, by improving steel smelting and deoxidation technology, refining its chemical composition, and developing effective heat treatment regimes
Expansion of fundamental research in the field of additive technologies to enhance Ukraine's defense capabilities
Development of new technologies for complex heat, deformation-thermal, and cryogenic treatment
